{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-ACRH17 |revision=(US) |series=AC1700 |asin=B07628HLTM |fcc_date=08/02/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG911DA |manuf_rev=AC24-ASU |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTHD00 |ic_id=3568A-RTHD00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NKQLCJ, E260300; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NKQLCJ, E260300; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NKQCRJ, K255200; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649EX;75E, 49EX, 4551;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6665;065F, E601, 063;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.50.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=10:7B:44,38:D5:47,AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=10:7B:44,38:D5:47,AC:9E:17 }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1700 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-ACRH17/overview/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-ACRH17}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com ===FCC info=== "ASUS RT-AC42U REV 1.10" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3492989 FCC photos]. A sticker on the flash chip suggests the ''Arcadyan WG911DAAC24-ASU'' model. {{see also|Arcadyan|ASUS}} Documents on the FCC claim that the RT-ACRH17 and RT-AC1700 are identical. *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00 MSQ-RTHD00] (2017-08-02) :Equipment: ''Wireless-AC1700 Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :Brand Name: ASUS; Model No.: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Letter/Model-Names-Confirmation-Letter-3492992 FCC Report] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (US) • [[ASUS RT-AC42U]] (EU) *[[ASUS RT-AC1700]] • (RT-ACRHD00) :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Label/Label-Sample-3492991 FCC Label Sample]. *CMIIT ID: [https://fccid.io/CMIIT-ID-2017AJ4019 CMIIT-ID-2017AJ4019] (2017-06-27) Despite having hardware capable of implementing three radios, this device :appears to only use the 2.4GHz radio of the IPQ4019 configured as 2x2. [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Users-Manual/User-Manual-3492997 User Manual] says, "wireless-AC speeds up to 1400Mbps on the 5GHz band :& 300Mbps on the 2.4GHz band concurrently". This is likely inaccurate. [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/RF-Exposure-Info/RF-Exposure-3492993 RF Exposure] document shows that : *two antennas are used for the 2.4GHz radio (ANT 0+1) and *four antennas are used for the 5GHz radio (ANT 0+1+2+3). ===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-127245-1-1.html Reviewed on '''KoolShare''' forums] (CN) (internal images) :Confirms 1.7Gbps 4x4 5GHz link rate The QCA9984 radio is capable of 4x4:4 and all four spatial streams appear to be wired :up in the FCC internal photos. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.mbreviews.com/asus-rt-acrh17-ac1700-review/ ''Asus RT-ACRH17 AC1700 Router Review'' on '''MBReviews.com'''] ===PSU=== Power Adapter: 100-240VAC ~50/60Hz 12VDC/2A * Power Adapter: '''SGE''' S24B72-120A200-C4 * Power Adapter: '''SFE''' F24W5-120120SPAU * Power Adapter: '''APD''' WA-24Q12FU ===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-ACRH12]] (AC1200) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-ACRH12/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH13]] (AC1300) • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH13/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH15]] (AC1500) • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH15/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (AC1700) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-ACRH17/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH18]] (AC1750) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-ACRH18/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH26]] (AC2600) • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH26/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC42U]] (EU) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] (EU) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC58U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' • ([https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c QCA]) __NOTOC__
